content:
Scratch cloud variables are variables that change throughout all running instances of a project, and remain the same, even if the project is not running anywhere. They are perfect for highscores and realtime online multiplayers, polls, and very special things with external resources connected to the cloud server...
This is actually really cool because you can have a machine providing a heartbeat via the cloud server. You could even make a web server within scratch!
You could also have a project controlling something of yours. Something like this.


More on this later.
title: Scratch Cloud Variables
